title: horrible ping and lag spikes with patch 6.14 and 6.15
body: i have great internet. I can run literally anything else perfectly except this game. its borderline ridiculous with these last two patches. ive tried multiple fixes but the lag spikes are insane-shooting anywhere to 400-3000. any  suggestions fellas? I'm open to anything.

replies.body: These lag spikes could be due to your network suffering packet loss or a weak connection.  I recommend running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will get an overview of what's going on.  It will then offer a series of steps to resolve your specific issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!

What he means is they didn't do any thing at all to screw up the game's server but in fact we all just happen to suddenly have horrible ping times since the patch. You know like even though every log prior to patch showed little to no packet loss and an average 50 ms than since the patch its been border 220 ms with spikes of 500+.

Yep its "our" network for sure.
use hotspot shield, it might be internet traffic from your neighbors
I have tired it but still same thing, any other fixes
Well my problem was the speed and duplex in my network connection, it was too low for gaming so my ping was high, so i increased it and it worked

I have a great internet too just as he said everything runs crystal clear for me but this game somethings is going crazy with that spikes. Like evrysay I play and certain times I get irritated as the space keys go from 26 ms to 600 ms don't know y. Can you guys please help fix this?
For anyone else having this issue, I got my ping back when I added League to my Firewall exception. At least it seems to work for now, maybe it might work for you.

I also am having terrible connection 400-1000 after the new patch. Two days ago I purchased a new router and today my cable company installed a new modem. With all this still having the connection issue. I do not have this issue with any other devices in my home. I am running OS X El Capitan 10.11.6 after trying updating from 10.11.3. Please help look into this issue ASAP as we spend a lot of money.{{champion:32}}

Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

If those steps don't help, you can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. I suggest downloading the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

104.160.131.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here if you'd like us to help, or submit them in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
